description: XConStats is a browser-based telemetry viewer for Xbox controllers connected to your PC. It uses the Gamepad API to show real-time button presses, trigger values, and analog stick positions. Tune dead zones, monitor multiple controllers, and run quick rumble checks for QA, esports, or streaming overlays.

versions.notes: Multi-pad UI, dead-zone control, haptics test, and 30/60/120 Hz modes.
Stick crosshair view and trigger bars.
